title: 【Cover】end of a life
artist: Amelia Watson, Gawr Gura & Ninomae Ina'nis

lyrics.en: We'd run right through those nights I'll never find my way back to you
lyrics.zh: 我們曾經一起走過那些夜晚 我從未為了尋找你而走過回頭路

lyrics.en: Inside this labyrinth of lights there was madness In the meaning, never laughless
lyrics.zh: 在這光耀的迷途中 我們曾經瘋狂，且未曾失去歡笑

lyrics.en: We were screaming at the top of our lungs to the numbness
lyrics.zh: 我們尖叫到身體開始麻木

lyrics.en: This city never died I'll fly no proof those heights
lyrics.zh: 而這些只意味著我們活著 我不需要證明我能飛得多高

lyrics.en: I'll never find another chance to say hey, ”Thanks for saving my life”, I was hopeless
lyrics.zh: 我卻從未找到機會向你道謝「謝謝你拯救了我」 我感到無助

lyrics.en: It was stinging, running roadless We were singing at the top of our lungs to the numbness
lyrics.zh: 那折騰著我 我們高聲歡唱直到身體開始麻木

lyrics.en: This city never died
lyrics.zh: 而這些只意味著我們活著

lyrics.en: What was the root of it all? I couldn't say
lyrics.zh: 最初的最初是什麼，我可能無法闡明

lyrics.en: Used to jump and then fall, rugged and cliched Would shrug it off without complaint, not a sound
lyrics.zh: 飛越後的墜落，是如此的崎嶇 是如此的陳腔濫調 只需毫無保留的聳聳肩，毋須任何言語

lyrics.en: No use in trying to find friends, cuz in the end nobody sticks around
lyrics.zh: 不用找尋自己的朋友，因為結局都是孤身一人

lyrics.en: It's when you shoved yourself into a crowded place That you turned around and found yourself in love in outer space
lyrics.zh: 當你躋身於繁碌之中 而你回頭時才發現你摯愛於異世

lyrics.en: Cue the reckless nights, no strings Laughing at our own dreams
lyrics.zh: 在這瘋狂的夜晚之中，嘲笑著自己的夢

lyrics.en: Just what the hell was so funny?
lyrics.zh: 能有什麼好笑的？

lyrics.en: Bark up the wrong tree, stumble, used to falling great heights
lyrics.zh: 早已習慣找錯了目標，在路上摔跤

lyrics.en: Amidst a concrete jungle, singing cuz it felt right
lyrics.zh: 在這城市中，一時興起的高歌

lyrics.en: We mixed the ennui and troubles rhyming our discontent
lyrics.zh: 將無聊與麻煩寫進了不悅之中

lyrics.en: And though it's history, I can't forget the time that we spent Convinced that this could mean another end
lyrics.zh: 即便已經過去，我仍無法忘卻曾經一共的時光 相信存在於虛實之間的結束

lyrics.en: Exists between real and pretend A twisted alter-fiction where I missed my chance, did not ascend
lyrics.zh: 在虛幻的現實之中我失去了機會

lyrics.en: and disappearing into the mist of never happened
lyrics.zh: 迷失在那片「未曾發生」的迷霧中

lyrics.en: Is the me that I can never befriend.
lyrics.zh: 或許那是我無法掌握的人

lyrics.en: I let it go…
lyrics.zh: 於是我讓他走…

lyrics.en: Fade in, fade out, this crazy dream
lyrics.zh: 無論漸進其中，抑或淡出其外 在這瘋狂的夢中

lyrics.en: Without a direction, floating aimlessly
lyrics.zh: 毫無目標的沉浮著

lyrics.en: There's nothing left back there for me
lyrics.zh: 那裏已經不值得回首了

lyrics.en: Breathe in, but it won't stop the rain from pouring
lyrics.zh: 深呼吸 即便那雨永不停息

lyrics.en: We'd run right through, those nights
lyrics.zh: 我們曾經一起走過那些夜晚

lyrics.en: I'll never find my way back to you inside this labyrinth of lights
lyrics.zh: 我從未為了尋找你而走過回頭路，在這光耀的迷途中

lyrics.en: There was madness in the meaning, never laughless
lyrics.zh: 我們曾經瘋狂，且未曾失去歡笑

lyrics.en: We were screaming at the top of our lungs to the numbness
lyrics.zh: 我們尖叫到身體開始麻木

lyrics.en: This city never died, but was there ever a soul inside?
lyrics.zh: 而這些只意味著我們活著 但最初的心還在其中嗎？

lyrics.en: Chasing fireflies between the soaring high-rises
lyrics.zh: 在逐漸升高的地方追逐螢光

lyrics.en: Left a trail behind, defined it 'wasted time of our lives'
lyrics.zh: 殘餘的路象徵著人生中浪費的時光

lyrics.en: Silent singer, overworked and underpaid
lyrics.zh: 沉寂的歌手，領著不符工時的工資

lyrics.en: Thinks an office is a coffin until off is where you're laid
lyrics.zh: 想著辦公室像一座已躺入的棺材

lyrics.en: Yet a thought persists, an optimist who ought to be afraid
lyrics.zh: 但是一個想法的成長是一個樂觀的人應該害怕的

lyrics.en: Saw the 'nothing wrong' in writing songs behind the lonely shade
lyrics.zh: 看過了在寂靜的影中寫著「沒事」

lyrics.en: Is the world a sadder place without the words that you conveyed?
lyrics.zh: 如果你沒有說出你心中所想，這個世界會變得更悲慘嗎？

lyrics.en: When the ladder fell and shattered every bar that we had played
lyrics.zh: 當競爭的梯子墜落，摧毀了我們演奏過的酒吧

lyrics.en: Does it matter in the end the sound diminished and decayed
lyrics.zh: 那漸弱的聲音在最後真的重要嗎？

lyrics.en: And your friends grew tired of fantasy? You're wishing they had stayed?
lyrics.zh: 當你的朋友因夢想而疲累，你仍冀望他們能夠持續下去？

lyrics.en: You don’t get to say “I miss you” You watched your heroes fade
lyrics.zh: 你不必說「我想念你」

lyrics.en: Into the rear view-mirror of the villain you portrayed
lyrics.zh: 你看著你的英雄逐漸變成你口中的惡徒

lyrics.en: Stop the pity party, listen, you don’t get to be dismayed
lyrics.zh: 停止天真的同情了，你不需要為此難過

lyrics.en: You don’t get to be emotional, feel blessed you got it made
lyrics.zh: 你不需要情緒化，只需要感謝讓你成功的

lyrics.en: These the best of years of life because you chose to make a trade
lyrics.zh: 這是你人生最好的一年，因為你選擇了交易

lyrics.en: Recollect the days you hoped and you prayed for this
lyrics.zh: 想想當時的你所期望和所做的一切

lyrics.en: What is there to miss?
lyrics.zh: 那還有什麼值得留念的呢？

lyrics.en: Fade in, fade out, this hazy dream
lyrics.zh: 無論漸進其中，抑或淡出其外 在這朦朧的夢中

lyrics.en: Without a direction, roaming aimlessly
lyrics.zh: 毫無目標的沉浮著

lyrics.en: There's nothing left back there for me
lyrics.zh: 那裏已經不值得回首了

lyrics.en: Pretend it's the end of a made up story
lyrics.zh: 就假裝它是這場偽劇的結束吧

lyrics.en: I'll fly no proof those heights
lyrics.zh: 我不需要證明我能飛得多高

lyrics.en: I'll never find another chance to say hey thanks for saving my life
lyrics.zh: 我卻從未找到機會向你道謝「謝謝你拯救了我」

lyrics.en: I was hopeless It was stinging driving roadless
lyrics.zh: 不循規蹈矩使我感到無助，那折騰著我

lyrics.en: We were singing at the top of our lungs to the numbness
lyrics.zh: 我們高聲歡唱直到身體開始麻木

lyrics.en: This city never died I'll say goodbye to the soul inside
lyrics.zh: 而這些只意味著我們活著 我將道別那份初心

lyrics.en: And yet somehow,
lyrics.zh: 但是為什麼

lyrics.en: There was romance
lyrics.zh: 在那裡有著

lyrics.en: In our self-hate
lyrics.zh: 我討厭的浪漫

lyrics.en: “We’ve got no chance”
lyrics.zh: 「我們沒有機會了」

lyrics.en: In this light maze
lyrics.zh: 在這光明的迷途中

lyrics.en: But let’s hold hands
lyrics.zh: 但讓我們牽起手

lyrics.en: Through the night haze
lyrics.zh: 一起走過夜中的迷霧

lyrics.en: We’ll run so fast
lyrics.zh: 我們開始奔跑

lyrics.en: ‘Til the school chime
lyrics.zh: 直到學校鐘響

lyrics.en: ‘Til the train runs
lyrics.zh: 直到火車啟航

lyrics.en: We know it’s time
lyrics.zh: 我們知道時間不多

lyrics.en: We’re the sane ones
lyrics.zh: 我們都是一樣的

lyrics.en: Waking up now
lyrics.zh: 醒來吧

lyrics.en: To the real life
lyrics.zh: 回到「現實的人生」

lyrics.en: Let me daydream
lyrics.zh: 讓我的白日夢

lyrics.en: ‘Til the next night
lyrics.zh: 沉浸到下個夜晚

lyrics.en: I’ll keep waiting
lyrics.zh: 我會一直等待

lyrics.en: I’ll keep waiting for you
lyrics.zh: 我會一直等你

lyrics.en: Waking up now to my real life Let me daydream
lyrics.zh: 醒來吧 到我的人生中 讓我的白日夢

lyrics.en: 'Til the next flight drowning so long I got older
lyrics.zh: 沉浸到下次的啟航 沉溺了這麼久 我也衰老了

lyrics.en: Now the crowd's gone Is it over? Is it over…?
lyrics.zh: 現在人都散了 就結束了嗎？ 都結束了嗎…？
